data.name: Doodle Champs
data.detailed_description:
Doodle Champs is the ultimate experience for artists and doodlers alike! Play an exciting assortment of doodle-tastic party games with endless replayability, or just draw on a shared online canvas with your pals!

Doodle Dash!

Doodle Dash is the main mode of the game - Draw funny randomly generated prompts with a fully customisable time limit! Award and earn medals to your friend's creations. You can save and post your creations online or straight to your device! (1-4 players)

Canvas Crew

No rules, no prompts, no nothin'! - Enjoy some chill drawin' time with ya pals. Draw together on an online canvas with your friends! Collaborate on one special masterpiece or just enjoy your friends' creations live as you all doodle on one shared canvas. (1-4 players)

Pencil Pushers

Get to work! Draw and pitch a new and exciting product to your friends based on a prompt! Will they BUY it or FRY it? (2-4 players)

Art Assembly

Artists assemble! Work together as a team to create the ultimate being as each player draws a different body part. You can also create your "masterpiece" solo. (1-4 players)

Personalise your canvas!

Choose from a range of awesome textured backgrounds to doodle on across all four game modes!

Achievement hunters welcome!

Doodle Champs will have a whole bunch of fun achievements to collect. Will you unlock them all?

data.short_description: Doodle Champs is the ultimate experience for artists and doodlers alike! Play an exciting assortment of doodle-tastic party games with endless replayability, or just draw on a shared online canvas with your pals!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7, 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
